review: I dont know why i didn't recommend this sooner. Probably one of my favorite games on steam ever. If any of my friends don't have Garry's Mod, Get it while its cheap, totally worth the money.
I crafted a crime-free completley equal society with the best education avaliable, and was assasinated by capitalists. 10/10
